function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"TB infection spreading in overcrowded settings","Impact":"Increased risk of TB transmission and propagation of multi- and extensively drug-resistant strains","Mitigation":"Implement effective prevention measures for TB transmission, including environmental control measures","Technologies":"Upper-room UV light as an environmental control measure","People":"Highly susceptible persons in overcrowded settings, individuals with TB","Owner":"Healthcare organizations, public health authorities"},{"Description":"Lack of studies in clinical settings for environmental control measures","Impact":"Limited adoption of effective environmental control measures for TB transmission","Mitigation":"Conduct additional studies in clinical settings to support the use of environmental control measures","Technologies":"Clinical research studies, data collection and analysis","People":"Public health researchers, healthcare organizations","Owner":"Research institutions, public health researchers"},{"Description":"Risks associated with PPD conversion and TB infection in animals","Impact":"Difficulty in characterizing true latent TB infection and delayed hypersensitivity alone","Mitigation":"Additional studies to characterize true latent TB infection, strains virulence, and PPD conversion","Technologies":"Animal studies, strain characterization techniques","People":"Animal researchers, veterinarians","Owner":"Research institutions, veterinary organizations"}]}
